variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: generator
variants.description: the build system generator to use

variants.name: async_api
variants.description: Set of async transfer APIs to enable

variants.name: bbapi_fallback
variants.description: Using BBAPI, if source or destination don't support             file extents then fallback to pthreads

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: ninja
dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.

dependencies.name: kvtree
dependencies.description:
KVTree provides a fully extensible C datastructure modeled after perl
hashes.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependent_to.name: filo
dependent_to.description: File flush and fetch, with MPI

dependent_to.name: veloc
dependent_to.description:
Very-Low Overhead Checkpointing System. VELOC is a multi-level
checkpoint-restart runtime for HPC supercomputing infrastructures

dependent_to.name: scr
dependent_to.description:
SCR caches checkpoint data in storage on the compute nodes of a Linux
cluster to provide a fast, scalable checkpoint/restart capability for
MPI codes
